name: Silibase SR-6168 Silicone Glue
description: Silibase SR-6168 Silicone Glue for Printed Circuit Board is a toluene solution based on polysiloxane raw rubber and resin, and then added with additives. It is a kind of high temperature resistant pressure sensitive adhesive. It can be mixed with other methylsiloxane pressure sensitive adhesives to achieve specific properties. It can be used over a wide temperature range and can bond a variety of low surface energy, difficult-to-bond materials such as silicones, fluoropolymers, polyolefins, and more.
company_name: Jiande City Silibase Silicone New Material Manufacturer
